heading: Full Vessel of Hatred Patch Notes
content: Here is the full Vessel of Hatred Patch Notes including the initial 2.0 Patch Notes as well as the 2.0.1 and 2.0.2 Patch Notes Updates. Legendary aspect affix values now have a separate cap between Ancestral and Non-Ancestral items. Now, the maximum values for aspects can only be found on Ancestral items. Burning Instinct Legendary Node Burning Instinct Legendary Node (Don't walk or evade) (Become Crowd Controlled or Injured) (+3 to all Skills) (Spiritborn Vortex) (Rogue Concealment) (Sorcerer Teleport) (Movement Speed and Evade refresh) (Enhanced Earthen Bulwark) (Abhorrent Iron Maiden) (Stun Grenades) (Spiritborn Pestilent Swarm) (Critical Overpower) (Generic Cooldown Reduction) Cah (Spiritwolves) (Ultimate Cooldown Reduction) (Barbarian Challenging Shout) Runes removed: The following runes have had their icons updated to match their Diablo II predecessors. Updates for adding sockets to items: Flawless Technique Weapon Master Force of Nature Thunderstruck Earthen Devastation Survival Instincts Heightened Malice Inner Beast Constricting Tendrils Ancestral guidance Hulking Monstrosity Flesh Easter Scent of Death Blood Begets Blood Eldritch Bounty Tricks of the Trade Deadly Ambush Leyrana's Instinct No Witnesses Exploit Weakness Burning Instinct Static Surge Ceaseless Conduit Elemental Summoner Enchantment Master - Mythic Unique Helm - Mythic Unique Chest Armor - Mythic Unique Polearm - Generic Utility Aspect New Recipe Sharpened Finesse Elemental Surge Tempering Recipe has been split into two recipes All class's Skill Trees have been updated to create new connections between nodes. - Weapon Mastery Skill - 12 second Cooldown - Unique Helm - Offensive Aspect Aspect of the - Offensive Aspect - Offensive Aspect Bleed Innovation – New Utility Recipe Barbarian Breach – New Utility Recipe Brute Innovation – New Utility Recipe Core Augments – Barbarian New Weapon Recipe Brawling Augments – New Weapon Recipe Weapon Augments – New Weapon Recipe Legendary Node Rare Nodes: - Earth Core Skill - 30 Spirit Cost - Unique Totem Aspect of the - Utility Aspect Aspect of the - Offensive Aspect Aspect - Offensive Aspect - Offensive Aspect - Offensive Aspect Lightning Augments Legendary Node - Darkness Ultimate Skill - 50 second Cooldown - Unique Helm Aspect - Offensive Aspect Aspect - Offensive Aspect - Offensive Aspect Bone Innovation - New Utility Recipe Blood Innovation - New Utility Recipe Decay Innovation - New Utility Recipe Execution Innovation - New Utility Recipe Legendary Node - Cutthroat Agility Skill - 6 Charges, 1 second Charge Cooldown - Unique Ring - Offensive Aspect - Offensive Aspect - Offensive Aspect Agile Augments - New Weapon Recipe Assassin Augments - New Weapon Recipe Warped Augments - New Weapon Recipe Basic Augments — Rogue Core Augments — Rogue Legendary Node - Conjuration Skill - 3 Charges, 12 second Charge Cooldown - Unique Gloves - Offensive Aspect - Offensive Aspect - Offensive Aspect Pyromancy Augments - Fiery - Weapon Recipe Frozen Augments - Frozen - Weapon Recipe Sorcerer Innovation - Utility Recipe Legendary Node Enhanced Frenzy Combat Frenzy Battle Frenzy Ground Stomp Enhanced Ground Stomp Tactical Ground Stomp Strategic Ground Stomp Furious Upheaval Slaying Strike Unconstrained Martial Vigor The following lists all the affixes now available for each Tempering recipe. Bleed Augments – Weapon Recipe Furious Augments – Weapon Recipe Berserking Augments Berserking Finesse – Offensive Recipe Barbarian Innovation – Utility Recipe Wasteland Augments – Changed to a Utility recipe Sandstorm Augments – Weapon Recipe Demolition Finesse – Offensive Recipe Of Giant Strides Of Bul-Kathos Of Earthquakes Of Sundered Ground Bold Chieftain's Aspect Twin Strikes Ring of Red Furor Hemorrhage Board Blood Rage Board Carnage Board Decimator Board Bone Breaker Board Flawless Technique Board Warbringer Board Weapons Master Board Squall Rare Node Brawl Rare Glyph Dominate Rare Glyph Innate Debilitating Roar reworked Preserving Debilitating Roar Earthen Bulwark Ursine Strength Grizzly Rage Prime Petrify Heightened Senses Bestial Rampage Perfect Storm Nature's Fury Overload Spirit Boon Bolster Spirit Boon Aspect of the Blurred Beast Shockwave Aspect Stormclaw's Aspect Aspect of the Ursine Horror Seismic-shift Aspect Stormshifter's Aspect Aspect of Retaliation Crashstone Aspect Bold Chieftain's Aspect Fleshrender Dolmen Stone Wildheart Hunger Hunter’s Zenith Earthbreaker Mad Wolf's Glee Greatstaff of the Crone All Weapon Tempering recipes have been updated with the following stats. Storm Augments Lightning Augments Earth Augments Werewolf Augments Werebear Augments Companion Augments Moved or Removed Recipes Starter Board Thunderstruck Board Earthen Devastation Board Survival Instincts Board Lust for Carnage Board Heightened Malice Board Inner Beast Board Constricting Tendrils Board Ancestral Guidance Board Blood Lance Army of the Dead Transfusion - Cooldown for spawning a Blood Orb reduced from 4 to 2 seconds. Death's Approach - Movement Speed increased from 4/8/12% [+] to 5/10/15% [+]. Kalan's Edict Bonded in Essence Death's Defense Necrotic Carapace Bone Golem Active Skill Blood Golem Sacrifice Aspect of Cursed Aura Tidal Aspect Shademist Aspect Aspect of Fel Gluttony Aspect of the Damned The Mortacrux Black River Greaves of the Empty Tomb Ring of Mendeln Lidless Wall Mutilator Plate All Weapon Tempering recipes have been updated with the following stats. Bone Augments Blood Augments Shadow Augments - Decay Shadow Augments - Execution Summoning Augments Other Tempering Updates: Starter Board Hulking Monstrosity Flesh-Eater Board Scent of Death Bone Graft Board Blood Begets Blood Board Bloodbath Board Wither Board Enhanced Blade Shift Fundamental Blade Shift Invigorating Strike Fundamental Invigorating Strike Enhanced Invigorating Strike Disciplined Shadow Step Concealment Subverting Concealment Countering Concealment Prime Shadow Clone Supreme Death Trap Rain of Arrows Supreme Rain of Arrows Prime Rain of Arrows Weapon Mastery Close Quarters Combat Adrenaline Rush Mending Obscurity Aspect of True Sight Resistant Assailant's Uncanny Treachery Opportunists Icy Alchemists Aspect Toxic Alchemists Aspect Bladedancer's Aspect Encircling Blades Of Iron Rain Escape Artist's Word of Hakan All Weapon Tempering recipes have been updated with the following stats. Trap Augments Basic Augments - Rogue Core Augments - Rogue Other Tempering Changes: Devious Glyph Starter Board Eldritch Bounty Board Tricks of the Trade Board Cheap Shot Board Deadly Ambush Board Leyrana’s Instinct Board No Witnesses Board Exploit Weakness Board Cunning Stratagem Board Enhanced Charged Bolts Enhanced Fireball Prime Deep Freeze Chain Lightning Enchantment Hydra Enchantment Arc Lash Enchantment Incinerate Enchantment Endless Pyre Conjuration Mastery Storm Swell Aspect Aspect of Engulfing Flames Aspect of Armageddon Meteorites from Aspect of Armageddon and Aspect of Shattered Stars now more consistently land around or on the enemies near the cast target. Tal Rasha's Iridescent Loop Axial Conduit Gloves of the Illuminator All Weapon Tempering recipes have been updated with the following stats. Pyromancy Augments Pyromancy Augments - Fiery Frozen Augments - Frozen Frost Augments Conjuration Augments Shock Augments - Discharge Shock Augments - Surge Other Tempering Updates: Starting Board Searing Heat Board Burning Instinct Board Frigid Fate Board Icefall Board Static Surge Board Ceaseless Conduit Board Elemental Summoner Board Enchantment Master Board All Unique items now have a single boss for target farming: Our focus is now on the Season 6 and Vessel of Hatred’s Launch. As usual, the will provide you with the most accurate resources and guides out there! We're continuing to work on more updates and bug fixes for ! Stay awhile and learn! With that said, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development and to make the most of your Season 5 experience! Also don't forget to check out our Written by:
